# Photo Upload Instructions

## How to Add Your Photos

1. **Add 10 photos** to this directory (`public/photos/`)
2. **Name them**: `photo1.jpg`, `photo2.jpg`, `photo3.jpg`, ... `photo10.jpg`
3. **Supported formats**: `.jpg`, `.jpeg`, `.png`, `.webp`

## Recommended Specifications

- **Aspect Ratio**: 4:3 or 16:9 (landscape orientation works best)
- **Resolution**: 1200x800px or higher for best quality
- **File Size**: Keep under 2MB per image for faster loading
- **Format**: JPEG is recommended for photos (smaller file size)

## Example File Names

```
photo1.jpg
photo2.jpg
photo3.jpg
photo4.jpg
photo5.jpg
photo6.jpg
photo7.jpg
photo8.jpg
photo9.jpg
photo10.jpg
```

## Tips

- Use high-quality photos for the best visual experience
- Consider the order - photos will display in numerical order
- You can use online tools like [TinyPNG](https://tinypng.com/) to compress images without losing quality
- Make sure photos are properly oriented before uploading

## After Adding Photos

Simply refresh the website - the slider will automatically display your photos!
